resources.string: A. Line 4 instantiates an Order. Java runs the declarations and instance initializers first in the order they appear. This sets value to tacf. Line 5 creates another Order and initializes value to tacb. The object on line 5 is stored in the same variable line 4 used. This makes the object created on line 4 unreachable. When value is printed, it is the instance variable in the object created on line 5.
